title: Auditing - Dark Web Credential Scan
description: A security analyst runs a dark web scan for a client to see if any of their corporate email addresses and passwords have been exposed in third-party breaches.

tasks.description: Run a dark web scan using the client's email domain.
Analyze the scan results to identify any exposed credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scan finds 5 users whose credentials were found in a recent breach of another service.

tasks.description: Create a report of the findings and force a password reset for the affected users.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is notified of the exposure, and the risk is mitigated by forcing password resets.
